title: Gia Russa Pasta Sauce
generatedText: Gia Russa Pasta Sauce: This product is an excellent match if you are searching for a healthy noodles. This product contains no ingredients that some research suggests you should avoid. This product has 17 ingredients (in our experience: the fewer ingredients, the better!) This product contains 160 calories, 14g grams of fat, 2g grams of protein, and 7g grams of carbs per serving.

ingredients.name: rennet
ingredients.description: Rennet is an additive often used in cheese-making because the enzyme it contains curdles the milk. Traditionally, rennet is sourced from the stomachs of calves, but non-animal sources do exist. Certain types of cheese, such as authentic Parmesan and Gorgonzola, always use animal rennet. If you aren't sure whether a cheese is suitable for vegetarians, contact the manufacturer.

ingredients.name: spices
ingredients.description: "Spice" can refer to any number of spices. If you are allergic to a spice, you will need to call the manufacturer to find out which spices are included. Things like wheat and sugar have to be listed separately, so "spice" is safe for gluten free diets.

ingredientList: Imported Italian Plum Tomatoes, Heavy Whipping Cream (Milk), Fresh Onions, Imported Italian Olive Oil, Imported Italian Parmigiano Reggiano Cheese (100% Pure Cow's Milk, Cultures, Rennet, Salt), Salt and Spices, Fresh Garlic, Vodka, Crushed Red Pepper, Fresh Basil, All Natural Xanthan Gum
